segments.text: I'd like to talk to you about my grades .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure ! What exactly do you have questions about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am worried that I messed up on a test .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let me take a look at my grade book . How do YOU think you are doing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I am doing great , except for that one test !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , your scores show that you could do a little better . What do you think you could improve on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that I could study a little harder for tests .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine ! Please remember that regular attendance is the most important way to begin .
segments.speaker: S2
